definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)

Eight Giants of Tang and Song prose, esp. involved in the Classics movement 古文運動|古文运动[gu3 wen2 yun4 dong4], namely: Han Yu 韓愈|韩愈[Han2 Yu4], Liu Zongyuan 柳宗元[Liu3 Zong1 yuan2], Ouyang Xiu 歐陽修|欧阳修[Ou1 yang2 Xiu1], the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1], Wang Anshi 王安石[Wang2 An1 shi2], Zeng Gong 曾鞏|曾巩[Zeng1 Gong3]

sentences.english: In Tang and Song Dynasty, the sport of Cuju came to mature and prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋时期，蹴鞠运动走向成熟和繁荣。

sentences.english: The word "curtain" is widely used in graceful and restrained poems in Tang and Song Dyna-sty.
sentences.chinese: “帘”意象在唐宋婉约词中应用范围极其广泛。

sentences.english: Langzhong had already been a famous scenic area nationwide in the Tang and Song Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋时期，阆中已是全国著名的旅游胜地。

sentences.english: After Tang and Song Dynasty, the style of landscape-painting represented by the two Lis weakened gradually.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋以降，以“二李”为代表的青绿山水逐渐式微。

sentences.english: Paper-cutting in Zhangpu has a long history, which can date back to the ancient time(the Tang and Song Dynasties).
sentences.chinese: 漳浦剪纸的历史源远流长，可以追朔到唐宋时期。

sentences.english: This paper intends to explore the general situation of vulgar ci-verse in Tang and Song Dynasty and its aesthetic value.
sentences.chinese: 本文欲对唐宋俚词的创作概貌和美学价值进行探讨。

sentences.english: Commendation for filial piety is very important to the social education in Tang and Song periods.
sentences.chinese: 旌表孝悌是唐宋两代社会教化的重要方面。

sentences.english: Mao Kun is a representative writer of the "Tang-Song School" in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 茅坤是明朝“唐宋派”代表作家之一。

sentences.english: Before Tang-Song Dynasty , the "external wind " was considered as the main cause of stroke .
sentences.chinese: 在唐宋以前，中风的外风论是主流思想。

sentences.english: Third, the typical style of sculpture art of the Shaanxi grotto temple of Tang and Song Dynasty is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结陕西唐宋石窟寺雕刻艺术的典型风格。

sentences.english: Tang and Song Dynasties when the lights began to appear all kinds of juggling skills ShangXi.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋时灯市上开始出现各式杂耍技艺。

sentences.english: Among the Eight Great Scholars of Tang and Song Dynasty, six were clustered in the capital then.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋八大家中的宋六家皆群集于京城。

sentences.english: It is shown minute details the art achievement of the Tangsong Expert Ci by the angle of "Ciren's sentence construction".
sentences.chinese: 由“词人句法”的角度显微唐宋名家词的艺术成就。

sentences.english: Fengshan displace peak west of the Tang and Song dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 峰西侧为唐宋封禅故址。

sentences.english: There were many significant differences between the dishes cooking of Tang Dynasty and that of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋两代是中国副食烹饪发展的重要阶段。

sentences.english: It originated in the han dynasty, the development of the song, Ming prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 它起源于汉代，发展于唐宋，兴盛于明清。

definition: the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
Yuan dynasty theater, including poetry, music and comedy
